short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to import a form from active browser tab into your AbcSubmit.com account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to import form from different pages into AbcSubmit drag and drop form builder.

This is a very useful feature which allows you to centralize all your company or personal website forms into a single point of administration and embedding.
